devicedata.name: Pulse-Eight ProAudio1632
devicedata.creator: Zonn Moore
devicedata.history: Version 3.1.0 Add support for bass/treble settings in navigators. This version requires OS 3.2.3 or higher. Version 3.03 Update documentation Version 3.02 Handle multiple error codes correctly Version 3.01 Skipped Version 3.00 Initial Release.

config.identify_text: Press the ID button on the back of the switch.

property.name: ...Coax Audio

items.item: 0 - Coax output is switched independent of analog
2 - Coax is independent, uses stereo mix if available for source

property.default: 0 - Coax output is switched independent of analog

items.item: Set all zones to powered-off by default
